name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ttrack - Track your time, your way.

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome Extension to connect the ttrack app with Let's Deel

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Works with https://ttrack.top to make your life easier when tracking your work (how many hours you worked, and what tasks you did).

The website https://ttrack.top gives you a nice UI to register your work, and this extension helps you to register your work on the Deel website, rendering a calendar on the top of the Deel's form to submit your work, and when you click on a day from the calendar, it automatically fill the form for you.

Some other features:
- Button to copy Jira ticket and/or title
- Button to copy Github PR title
